results.name: Fundamental positive solution x = x2(n) of the second class of the Pell equation x^2 - 2*y^2 = A007519(n), n >= 1 (primes congruent to 1 mod 8).
comment: The corresponding term y = y2(n) of this fundamental solution of the second class of the (generalized) Pell equation x^2 - 2*y^2 = A007519(n) = 1 + 8*A005123(n) is given in 2*A254763(n).
For comments and the Nagell reference see A254760.
formula: a(n)^2 - 2*(2*A254763(n))^2 = A007519(n) gives the second smallest positive (proper) solution of this (generalized) Pell equation.
